title: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, if it has no suggestions, the file should not be marked as dirty but currently it is.
OB: When code assist is triggered in an unchanged file with no suggestions, the file is being marked as dirty.
EB: The file should remain unchanged after using code assist with no suggestions.
SR:
1. Open a file in the code editor. 
2. Activate code assist in the file by using the appropriate keyboard shortcut or menu option. 
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirty even though code assist has no suggestions.
